result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Review hearing on May 18, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary Hearing on May 23, 2022 at 09:20 am.

Includes cases 22CF524 & 22CT88. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances unless prescribed but taken only as prescribed.  No bars, taverns, liquor stores, beer tents.  No driving without valid DL. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

ADDRESS INFO for Denise G. Syvertsen
Current: 3200 Hilltop Drive, Wausau, WI 54401 United States  (Effective: 05-03-2022)
Prior: 101 W Vinal St #163, Wittenberg, WI 54499

Clerk: Amy. 
Case called:  2:14 p.m. 
INCLUDES 22CF524, 22CT88.  
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo for ADA Natalie Zibolski.   Defendant appears In custody by video from MCJ with Atty Trevor Peterson.  

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
PLEA: Not guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: $1500.00 signature bond to include both cases. 

CONDITIONS: 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances unless prescribed but taken only as prescribed.   
- No bars, taverns, liquor stores, beer tents.  
- No driving without valid DL. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

Defendant's current address is 3200 Hilltop Drive, Wausau, WI  54401.

RH:  5/18/22 at 1:00 p.m., Courtroom B. 
PH:  5/23/22 at 9:20 a.m., Courtroom B.
